title: Academic Advisor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX)
Interview Descriptions: I step interview process with the Dean and the Associate Dean of the give college via Blue Jeans. Extremely laid back interview that laid explained the position, caseload, and expectations.
Interview Questions: Describe a time where you have to deliver difficult information to a student. How did you handle it?

title: Enterprise Engagement Technician II Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: Many scenario and circumstance based questions to gauge the technical and interpersonal readiness of the technician to deal with the dynamic nature and culture of TSU.  Questions are not very technical, good interview
Interview Questions: What would you do if a VP, account department, and classroom all called you a the same time?

title: Assistant Professor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: Included interview panel with department chair and search committee, presentation to faculty and presentation to students. Lasted about 6 hours or so. Interview questions were situational and about teaching style/experience.
Interview Questions: Share about your teaching philosophy

title: Advisor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions:
Contacted by email and was interviewed by three persons panel. Each asked 10 questions each.
PowerPoint presentation was requested by the panel.
There was different level of difficulty of questions with aloted time frame to answer each question.
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself and your education background

title: Tutor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: pplication. I interviewed at H E B in Oct 2020. Interview. First I did an interview through HireVue that asked about 5 personality questions that required a short video answer and 2 technical questions: 1 multiple choice and 1 open ended. This interview …
Interview Questions: How did sdf one do the one thing

title: Asst. director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: Things went smoothly. There were three interviews that were processed pretty quickly and efficiently. I was notified of the process and outcomes quickly which greatly eases anxiety.  The offer was not received without a completion of the background first which was a little different than I’ve experienced.
Interview Questions: 3 qualities of a good leader

title: Library Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: The interview  was very short. Some questions were work related while many more were personal questions about interests and hobbies college major and dreams and aspirations. Overall its not nearly as nerve racking as other interviews
Interview Questions: How do I deal with difficult customers/situations

title: Student Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: Very simple process with interviewing. I was an undergrad at the time and the professor that approached me with the opportunity knew my work ethic from class projects and asked if I was interested.
Interview Questions: Are you interested in being a student assistant?

title: Customer Service Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: The interview very easy. Interview questions were very simple. No need to stress about it. Friendly staff when I worked there. I got the job and was told the following week.
Interview Questions: have you worked at a gym before?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX)
Interview Descriptions: My interview was very quick because I made myself known as a student leader. I was requested for this position out of another position I held within the college. I went to the office, requested to see the hiring manager and had an interview right then. The longest part of the process was getting cleared through HR.
Interview Questions: How is your course load this semester?

title: Call Center Representative Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Jul 2017
Interview Descriptions: Had two interviews, the first one was a very professional interview with a lady in the students center computer lab second floor. The second interview was a friendly interview with two interviewers in the Office of information system in Hanna Hall third floor.
Interview Questions: Tell me about your self.

title: Graduate Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Jun 2016
Interview Descriptions: to get this position, the candidate must apply for the position directly in the departmental office. the office administrator will review the initial documents and setup an interview with the chair of the department. the interview is conducted by the chair in person. in order to be eligible for this job, a student must be enrolled in that department as a full time student and must have excellent CGPA.
Interview Questions: Why do you think you are a good fit for this position ?

title: Offensive Coordinator/QB Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: Two day interview---very organized---meet the AD, President and all the offensive team members---had dinner with alumni the first evening----on day one, I did a four hour presentation to the offensive staff
Interview Questions: What is your plan to improve offensive production

title: Undergrad Student Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was very smooth, im not the best at interviews but I was very comfortable and the Director had a very warm inviting feel to her. I think that the best part of the interview was her layout of questions with ease making me feel like I was not under any pressure.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to pursue a career in Transportation?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Dec 2014
Interview Descriptions: Stop By the Human resources office and apply, call you back within a week. They will conduct a phone interview and shortly there after schedule you for an in person interview.
Interview Questions: General Interview questions, prepare for scenarios.

title: Librarian Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: It seemed more like a grilling session than interview. There was a panel of two older ladies that conducted the interview. It caught me off guard slightly. The whole process is different depending on the department you apply with as each group have different requirements from the interviewee's personality rather than qualifications.
Interview Questions: How far along are you in school?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process was pretty easy just had to fill out an application and waited for the call. Once you get a call you attend a meeting in which you are told what it is you will be teaching that particular semester.
Interview Questions: The most difficukt thing is to gather your notes and lectures together for the class in such a short period of time.

title: Graduate Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Mountain Home, AR) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: just phone intern...“How would you help a student decide which internship to take if they had more than one option?”“How would you help a student decide which internship to take if they had more than one option?”
Interview Questions: “How would you help a student decide which internship to take if they had more than one option?”

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Texas Southern University
Interview Descriptions: I honestly do not remember much about the interview and hiring process, other than it was relatively straight-forward.  An application was completed.  A call was recieved requesting an interview.  Maybe 1 week later the job offer was extended.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Police Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Mar 2013
Interview Descriptions: its a panel of five people from the department and they will ask you series of scenario questions. The questions are TCOLE based and it will also have questions that are relevant to one working at a university police department.
Interview Questions: If a man is reported to be urinating on the side of the school, what is the charge?

title: Student Woker Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Sept 2012
Interview Descriptions: I didn't have an interview. I was once a work study student and was promoted to Student Worker my junior year of college. The interview process is easy from what I hear though. If you need a job that is on campus and works with your class schedule this is the job for you.
Interview Questions: What is your major?

title: Graduate Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: On the spot interview process but it depends on the department that your applying for.  It can vary on what it will be like, the questions asked and the overall flow of the interview.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Tutor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Sept 2011
Interview Descriptions: I was called to meet the coordinator of the student service and she was impressed by my credential and especially my maths SAT score
Interview Questions: There wasnt any difficult question during the interview

title: Graduate Research and Teaching Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Texas Southern University (Houston, TX) in Apr 2010
Interview Descriptions: After filling out and submitting an application form, I was asked via email to attend a panel interview with 4 faculty members. Each interviewer had several questions from general background and experience to science and research. About 1 week after the interview, I was noticed via email that I got the offer.
Interview Questions: Asked a whole bunch of scientific questions including lots of abbreviations.
